en.welcome: Welcome to Calculator! Enter your name:
en.validName: Make sure to enter a valid name.
en.WhatOp: What operation would you like to perform? (1) ADD (2) SUBTRACT (3) MULIPLY (4) DIVIDE
en.again: Press (1) to go again, any other key to quit
